Labels.ValidationFailed_Caption: Warning : This package is not validated !

CommandButtons.Install_Caption: Install this application on my LiberKey

Errors.ErrRenameAppDir: An error occurs while trying to rename the application folder.\nCheck that the app is not running and that no file are open in the application folder.
Errors.ExtractErrorRestoreDone: Data extraction failed.\nThe previous version has been restored.
Errors.InstallerUpdateNeeded: This installation package is more recent than the installation wizard.\nUse the latest version of the wizard to install.
Errors.InstallError: An error occured during the installation of this application !
Errors.PackageValidationFailed: Warning, this package has not been validated
Errors.DataFileModified:
Installation package corrupted:
Data package has been modified

%name%
Errors.OldPackageVersion: This installation package is not supported any more by the installer wizard.\nImpossible to continue installation.
Errors.IncompleteSetup:
Some files could not be updated!
New versions of these files have been stored in the following directory:

%failedfolder%
Errors.ExtractErrorRestoreNotDone: Extraction of the application has failed.\nThe previous version has been kept in a backup directory.

Messages.LangMismatchWarning: Warning !\nYou are about to install a software in a language which is different from the language used for your LiberKey.\nWould you like to continue ?
Messages.AlreadyInstalled: This program is already installed on your LiberKey.\nDo you want to install it again?
Messages.DowngradeWarning:
Attention!

A newer version of this program is already installed on your LiberKey.

Version already installed: %current_version%
Version being installed: %setup_version%

Do you want to install the old version?
Messages.InstalledLangMismatchWarning:
Warning !
This software is already installed on your LiberKey with a different language.

The previous setup was made in: "%prevlang%"
This setup will be donne in: "%newlang%"

Do you want to continue ?
